actions.name: CreateAssignment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a user or group assignment for an Amazon Q Developer Profile

actions.name: DeleteAssignment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user or group assignment for an Amazon Q Developer Profile

actions.name: GenerateCodeFromCommands
actions.description: Grants permission to generate code from CLI commands in Amazon Q

actions.name: GetConversation
actions.description: Grants permission to get individual messages associated with a specific conversation with Amazon Q

actions.name: GetIdentityMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to Amazon Q to get the identity metadata

actions.name: GetTroubleshootingResults
actions.description: Grants permission to get troubleshooting results with Amazon Q

actions.name: ListConversations
actions.description: Grants permission to list individual conversations associated with a specific Amazon Q user

actions.name: PassRequest
actions.description: Grants permission to allow Amazon Q to perform actions on your behalf

actions.name: SendMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to send a message to Amazon Q

actions.name: StartConversation
actions.description: Grants permission to start a conversation with Amazon Q

actions.name: StartTroubleshootingAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to start a troubleshooting analysis with Amazon Q

actions.name: StartTroubleshootingResolutionExplanation
actions.description: Grants permission to start a troubleshooting resolution explanation with Amazon Q

actions.name: UpdateTroubleshootingCommandResult
actions.description: Grants permission to update a troubleshooting command result with Amazon Q
